about_the_game:
Step into the world of "League of Tacticians," a unique blend of strategy, storytelling, and tactical combat inspired by anime.

In a tribal fantasy universe, you play as Tomyris, a young girl determined to restore her once-great tribe’s honor in the War League, where battles are fought as a form of competition. Your best friend, now Khan of the clan, relies on you to execute his plans in the heat of combat. Together, you must outsmart your rivals and climb the ranks of the league.

Gameplay Features:

  • Tactical Combat: A mix of turn-based planning and real-time execution.

  • Strategic Objectives: Complete objectives in each battle to earn stars and progress.

  • Compelling Story: Experience the unfolding narrative through visual novel scenes before each mission.

  • Inspired Characters: Meet allies and rivals based on historical and legendary figures.
